| | Descriptive World | Normative World |
| - | - | - |
| **Statement** | "Bin Laden attacked us [because*]{.boxed-cb} we had been bombing Iraq for 10 years"<br><span style='font-size: 70%'>*("Standard" usage: prior = agent's stated reason)</span> | "Bin Laden attacked us because we had been bombing Iraq for 10 years, **and that is a good justification**" |
| **True or False?** | **Descriptively True** (empirically verifiable) | **Normatively True** (entailed by axioms + descriptive facts) in some ethical systems, **Normatively False** (not entailed by axioms + descriptive facts) in others |

: {tbl-colwidths="[18,41,41]"}
